plot.description: Hi-C plot object from \code{plotHicSquare} or\code{plotHicTriangle} on which to annotate pixels

data.description: A string specifying the BEDPE file path, a dataframe in BEDPEformat specifying pixel positions, or a\link[InteractionSet]{GInteractions} object specifying pixelpositions

type.description: Character value specifying type of annotation

half.description: Character value specifying which half of hic plotsto annotate

shift.description: Numeric specifying the number of pixels on either end ofmain pixel in a box or circle

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters

quiet.description: A logical indicating whether or not to print messages
